text:
test/Makefile.in (and test/Makefile.win, not that I can test that) needs to
propagate test failure error codes.  At present, you can have some tests fail
but the make job appears to succeed.
creator: peter+apache-bugsT4z9Wl@p12n.org

text:
Created attachment 20390
patch for 42725

Makefile.win part is untested but is identical to Makefile.in part
creator: peter+apache-bugsT4z9Wl@p12n.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Unix shell script won't work in this case (needs to be ported to cmd.exe syntax)
but I'll take a look at that exception.

Thanks for the proposed patch!

creator: bojan@rexursive.com
text:
I'm not sure why we're testing here for exit status of 255 (unrelated to the
attached patch). It looks to me like we should be testing for exit status != 0.
I'll commit some patches to the trunk to that effect.
See r574113 for apr and r574114 for apr-util.
creator: bojan@rexursive.com
bojan@rexursive.com
text: This should be fixed in trunk now (r574134/5).
